@graph.comment: Description of the (part of the) requirement that was tested
URL where more information about the requirement can be found
Impact of the test result on users: minor, moderate, serious, critical. Impact must only be set if the outcome is failed.
Definition of the node that was tested.
A node that along with the tested node lead to the test result
